import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { appName:string = 'fundamentals-app'; angularLogo:string = "https://angular.io/assets/images/logos/angular/angular.svg" btnDisabled:boolean = true email:string = "edu@eml.run" mostrarAlerta() { alert("Alerta ‚ö†Ô∏è") } contadorOvejas:number = 0 contarOveja() { this.contadorOvejas += 1 } }
